text: I have make a custom object-dealer name, when my leads come in I associated with this custom object, now i want to send emails and follows up emails to then how can i do that?

You will have to use the SearchCRM function and set the filter to search for deals by pipeline.  Here are general and deal-specific docs (the deal-specific docs page you can find by going to the Deals Endpoints tab and scrolling all the way down):  <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/search>
FYI: You may want to try out HubSpot's SalesForce marketplace app for integrating with SalesForce.  It's not free but there is a 30-day trial.
I think that the best way is to create a sequence to automate follow-up emails for your leads
I don’t have sequence subscription now, can we do it withs workflows?
I understand that it is possible, but if you'd like, we can arrange a call with my HubSpot expert to help you out

This Slack lives and breathes by its community. If you're posting a question, take a moment and click around a few channels to see if there are any questions you can help answer. Instant karma!

I think I just ran into a Bug while creating properties and I am wondering if anyone else came across this too.

*Cannot create new property with the same signature as a previously deleted property when the unique option is activated in the second run.*

Basically I created a new property and missed my chance to check the "unique" option.
So I archived and deleted the property and set it up again.
In the last step, HubSpot refuses to create the Property.

Sidenote: When I created a new proeprty with the unique option, then delete it, and then create it again -> it works.

I first want to confirm that others run into the same issue before reporting it officially.
